creator: jhunter@apache.org
text:
In beta5 I notice the access log prints times like this:

[25/May/2001:24:58:55 -0800]

Shouldn't that be 00:58:55?  :-)

-jh-

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
I was able to reproduce the bug.
I can't figure out why it happens, though.

The code responsible for the formatting of the time is in AccessLogValve, and 
is a SimpleDateFormat initialized by :
        timeFormatter = new SimpleDateFormat("kk:mm:ss");
        timeFormatter.setTimeZone(tz);

So I don't understand why the result is incorrect.

Any ideas ?
